description: The NSQIP_CDIFF_NEGATIVE_TEST table contains the tests that resulted negative for patients with postoperative occurrences of C. diff. The information is part of NSQIP registry submissions.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NSQIP_CDIFF_TEST_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the C. diff tests performed that resulted negative for a patient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


None


Enzyme immunoassay (EIA) for GDH


Enzyme immunoassay (EIA) for Toxin A/B


Antigen test (GDH assay)


Cell culture cytotoxicity assay


Polymerase chain reaction (PCR)


Nucleic Acid Amplification Tests (NAAT)


DNA Amplification (DNA-A)


Loop-Mediated Isothermal Amplification (LAMP)


Toxigenic stool culture


Unknown


Other
